attracc.attraccr: RIGIS standards 99 percent; comparison with source1

dataqual.logic: visual inspect of pt overlay source2 and source1
dataqual.complete: RIGIS standards - fuzzy-1.219 topologically complete arc-info point coverage

procstep.procdesc: SOURCE-ORIG1 =ri visitor map -1997 SOURCE-ORIG2 =rigis-ridot roads - s44trd95 Point locations for town and villages from source 1 were poistioned on road intersections on source 2 with arcedit with name attrributes from source 1.
Updated Point of Contact information for this dataset from "RIGIS Coordinator" to "Shane White."
